Sentencas: A framework for the automatic segmentation of large 3-D datasets of microscopic images is designed and tested for microstructures of solid oxide cells (SOC) electrodes reconstructed using focused ion beam-scanning electron microscopy (FIB-SEM).
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: The developed algorithm utilizes a simple, yet very effective deep neural network based on the patch-convolutional layers (patch-CNN) in the encoder-decoder configuration.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: The guidelines for a selection of network architecture and for preparing and minimizing the training dataset are given.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: The proposed methodology is tested for various SOC electrode microstructures.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: The analyzed FIB-SEM tomography data have different resolutions, material properties and measurement artefacts.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: Pixel-based accuracies of the validation datasets are over 97.5%, and the 3-D microstructural parameters calculated from the ground-truth data and CNN-data show good agreement.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: The proposed automatic patch-CNN microstructure reconstruction shortens the image processing time by two orders of magnitude.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: The proposed method can achieve high accuracy which has not been reported in previous studies.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: In addition, the proposed CNN can serve as an artificial pore-infiltration technique that will help to reconstruct samples without epoxy resin infiltration.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network

Sentencas: The developed framework can be easily extended for other multiphase porous materials with different 3-D imagining techniques that require image processing.
Titulo: Segmentation of Solid Oxide Cell Electrodes by Patch Convolutional Neural Network
